reviews.review_msg: Dont take REM 334 with her if you want to have a life. Weekly quizzes, lots of textbook readings, 2 midterms, a research paper, and a final. This class would've been somewhat more enjoyable if she didn't cram a textbook worth of information in 1 semester. Hard pass, will not recommend her or this class to anyone.

Even though I received over 90% in coursework, I still ended with a B+ due to my participation. If you are not comfortable talking in front of 60+ people, do not take a course with her! She marks participation very heavily. It was an interesting course, but frustrating to get this mark after all the reading and effort I put in.
A+ class, really enjoyed content and lecture style.
